entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Natashquan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:03 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -19.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Natashquan Airport 10:02 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -19.4°C
Pressure: 102.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -21.4°C
Wind: NNE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 18 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 26 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 20 in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending before morning then cloudy. Blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
